document_data.name: ''Wand of Illusion''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wand of illusion''''' was a [[magic item]] that enabled the wielder to create visible and audible [[illusion]]s.<ref name="DMG2R-p211>
document_data.Powers: This wand emitted an invisible ray that replicated the effects of the ''[[audible glamer]]'' and ''[[phantasmal force]]'' [[spell]]s. The wielder needed to concentrate on the illusion to maintain it. A single charge was required for each component of the created illusion. ''Wands of illusion'' could be recharged.
